meanings.definition: Having the shape of a hand with fingers extending from a central point.
meanings.sent1: The leaves of the plant were palmately shaped, resembling a hand with fingers.
meanings.sent2: The starfish had palmately arranged arms, just like the fingers of a hand.
meanings.sent3: The palmately designed gloves made it look like the wearer had leafy hands.
meanings.sent4: Her palmately spread fingers reached out to grab the falling leaf.
meanings.sent5: The palmately patterned rug felt like walking on a hand-shaped cloud.

meanings.definition: Arranged like the fingers of a hand.
meanings.sent1: The palmately positioned branches of the tree reached out in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The palmately spread petals of the flower resembled fingers splayed out.
meanings.sent3: The palmately arranged books on the shelf looked like a hand waving.
meanings.sent4: His palmately extended arms welcomed everyone with open hands.
meanings.sent5: The palmately aligned fence posts stood like a row of giant fingers.
